website_summaries.verdict: JanSport backpacks have served students well as book bags for years, and the Right Pack model is worthy of the name. We recommend investing in one with a reinforced leather bottom for improved durability.
pros: Heavy duty leather and Cordura outer shell provides durability
Classic book bag design also accommodates laptops
Padded shoulder straps or handle grip
cons: Zippers are plastic and hems are prone to fraying
Lower end models without leather bottoms can tear easily

customer_reviews.title: Broken zipper after 1 month, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Read other reviews about this product carefully. The backpack was fraying when I got it. Had to cut loose thread and singe with a lighter. NOT nylon. Did not sit well. Poorly shaped. OK - I could live with an average product. BUT, then the zipper failed. I am sending it back. What a pain. It was not cheap either. You'd do much better buying a cheap Target, Walmart or Costco backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very specious! Comfortable for a long time. Holds everything I need and more. Very durable! I beat mine up lot and have not had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Efren Torres

customer_reviews.title: It's a classic
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this pack, I guess for the retro vibe. I carried the same bag all through high school and I still use it for various things today and it had held up through all the hell I've put it through so as long as the new versions are built to the same standards then it should be a very durable bag.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Old school Jansport backpack - exactly what I wanted. Comfortable straps, perfect size, excellent quality. Black with brown leather bottom looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: We have had it for a year...Great bag! Durable, affordable, we love it. My son wanted this for school and this bag works well for weekend getaways as well. I have always used jansport. The quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product- well made. Love that it is not plastic and has Leather accents which increase the durability
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for school
customer_reviews.text: Works just like a backpack - perfect for high school - big enough but not too big
customer_reviews.author: Java

customer_reviews.title: My teen is happy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, spacious, and my 18 year old loves it. Has decorated with different pins in front fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack! Will last years, even with a teenager.
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack for kids that destroy multiple backpacks per year. His last one lasted 5 years and this is it's replacement. Great quality and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Travis

customer_reviews.title: Happy Backpack mom!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this it is big enough for her books for high school. .plus we always do Jansport backpacks because they last and never break
customer_reviews.author: shelbysmom

customer_reviews.title: Nice bookbag
customer_reviews.text: Seems very durable! Only gave it 3 stars because I haven’t used it yet. Did wear it around with my textbooks inside and it was a comfortable fit!
customer_reviews.author: ldell

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, light weight and I love the way ...
customer_reviews.text: I'v had the same Northface backpack since my sophomore year in highschool, back in 2010. Bought my first Jansport to retire my previous bag and was not let down! Super comfortable, light weight and I love the way it looks. A solid classic backpack for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Found someone else's stuff in it when I unwrapped it lol
customer_reviews.text: Seemingly new condition but I found someone else's lighter and a hairpin in one of the pockets. So if this is supposed to be new they just lied I guess :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Laptop bag
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know it was a laptop backpack,can't return it I'm out 55 dollars
customer_reviews.author: Susan Sloane

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: Classic backpack just like I used to have when I was a kid. My son loves the look of it.
customer_reviews.author: Leep

customer_reviews.title: Good bag. Too small for the cost
customer_reviews.text: This bag is too small for the price. It's a good and comfortable bag. It just is not as big as I expected for what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: The classics never die!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that out of all the backpacks on Amazon, this is the one my 14 year old son starting high school picked out because it's the same one that got me through high school!
customer_reviews.author: k.jennings

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good backpack for the kiddos! I wish it was cheaper though!
customer_reviews.author: August

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Back pack is perfect! Is large enough for laptop and books and looks nice to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my son loved it so much i ordered another one. arrived early!!
customer_reviews.author: MICHELE MAJOR

customer_reviews.title: Carries things comfortably.
customer_reviews.text: I put things in this bag and they're there when I open the bag!
customer_reviews.author: HAL

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have the white logo near buckle on strap!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this just now and the backpack seems fine but it doesn't have the logo on the strap near he buckle. I'm not sure if they don't make them with the logo anymore or what. But the logo is one of the reasons why I bought this specific jandport and it doesn't have it!?
customer_reviews.author: Katelin Joy Koepp

customer_reviews.title: Retro cool, exactly like the backpack you bought as a kid.
customer_reviews.text: Just so you know, the bottom isn't actually leather, but some sort of fabric that feels like leather on both sides. Kind of like really thick ultrasuede. High quality, but the straps aren't anything special relative to the cool shaped straps like you find on modern backpacks. Buying this backpack is like buying a showroom new 1957 Chevy bel air. It looks spectacular and works just like cars did in the late 1950s - but not like the cars do now. If you are into retro cool, this is sooooo perfect for you. If you want a super awesome backpack thought out by crazy passionate engineers, buy an Ogio. For me, I bought both, and love both.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected.
customer_reviews.text: I did not get exactly what the product look like in this photo. The interiors are grey, the suede leather is faded and there is no logo near the buckle of the shoulder strap. I ordered this same bag to a week ago, at this time from you but got the same look of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: King Ramos

customer_reviews.title: My son used his last jansport bag for a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: My son used his last jansport bag for a couple of years and we decided to get a new one for this school year. The carry strap on top broke on the 2nd day of school.
customer_reviews.author: Stiler Fan

product_meta.title: JanSport Right Pack Backpack
product_meta.description: With its signature suede leather bottom, the JanSport Right Pack is the iconic JanSport classic backpack. With an internal 15 inch laptop sleeve and front organizer pocket, the Right Pack by JanSport is sure to be the best backpack for wherever your day takes you. It's the original classic, but sometimes pairing that with your outfits is all that is needed to complete a sophisticated style!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars100 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
